page.title: 14Education
page.content: Cadishead has two primary schools, St Mary's C of E and Cadishead Junior School.Aged eleven most children will transfer to the local Irlam High School.This is a mixed 11 - 16 Comprehensive School,within the Salford Education Authority. Partington has four primary schools, with a separate grammar'secondary school system.Some pupils attend Broadoak Secondary School and others go to Urmston Grammar School.These schools are within the Trafford Education Authority. Glazebrook has no school and Hollins Green the one primary.Pupils of secondary age travel to 11 - 18 Comprehensive Schools at Culcheth or to Woolston School in Warrington.These schools are in the Cheshire Education Authoirity area.
